availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander B. Kinkead (McCracken County, Kentucky, druggist. )

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, druggist. Kentucky native. Married to Paulina Kinkead. Father of Milton Kinkead. Merchant in Morgan County, Illinois, in 1850. Druggist in Paducah, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed A. D. Moss as a clerk in Paducah in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Morgan County, p. 352A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, 1st District, p. 974
Find A Grave, "Alexander B. Kinkead (1816-1885)," Memorial #81732362, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/81732362 (accessed January 26, 2021).
